entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
